rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {2}{B}{G}{U} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Goddess Dance[/i] – Whenever Byleth, Emblem of The Instructor engages or you attack with four or more creatures, you may cast target card in your graveyard, and may pay life equal to its mana value instead of paying its mana costs.
